title: Write a phrase
text: Write a phrase about the length of the rectangl: $$14$$ less than the width
speech: Write a phrase about the length of the rectangl:  14  less than the width
pacedSpeech: Write a phrase about the length of the rectangl:   14

title: Substitution
text: Then, we substitute w for "the width".
speech: Then, we substitute w for "the width".
pacedSpeech: Then, we substitute w for "the width".

title: Subtration
text: Rewrite less than as subtracted from.
speech: Rewrite less than as subtracted from.
pacedSpeech: Rewrite less than as subtracted from.

title: Translate
text: Translate the phrase into algebra: w - $$14$$
speech: Translate the phrase into algebra: w -  14
pacedSpeech: Translate the phrase into algebra: w -   14
